body: Big boy ama if anyone wants to stay in contact hmu n I'll give ya me snapchat or something other than that ask away.

title: AMA // BmB

replies.body: why did you change your skin after having the same one for years? favorite type of music? how old are you? favorite dead gamemode? what game do you play the most? are you still in school? did you think avi would last as long as it did? best meme? favorite song? opinion
replies.body_tagged: why did you change your skin after having the same one for years? favorite type of music? how old are you? favorite dead gamemode? what game do you play the most? are you still in school? did you think avi would last as long as it did? best meme? favorite song? opinion

replies.body: Because the old skin sorta represented BC so changed it with the team switch plus LG had his dick up my arse, hmm listen to so much but atm fave artist has to be Brockhampton, I'm 16, has to be classic Nexus from way back in the day, Dota 2 atm, yea at sixth form, hmm never really considered it fully dying out, moshpit lil barnacle, Nights - Frank Ocean is my most listened so I guess I go with that, you always seemed down to earth and chilled never really knew ya tho.
